name: Kintaro
description:
Left/Right Arrow Keys = Moves the player Left/Right

Up Arrow Key = Attack Button

Player's Health Bar - Kintaro can take up to 3 hits, so if you get hit 3 times, it's Game Over and you'll have to try again.

Player's Stamina Bar - Each time that Kintaro slashes, his stamina bar decreases a little bit and, if the stamina is empty, the player cannot attack until it starts to recover.
